apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

providerConfig.description: ProviderConfig for AWS API operations. Defaults to "default".

region.description: AWS region for the allocation. Defaults to us-east-1.

crossplane.description: Configures how Crossplane will reconcile this composite resource

managementPolicies.description: Management operations permitted on composed resources.

regionalPoolId.description:
ID of the regional IPAM pool to allocate from (from aws-ipam status).
This pool should be the regional pool created by aws-ipam.

availabilityZones.description: Availability zone suffixes (a, b, c). Defaults to [a, b, c].

netmaskLength.description: Netmask length for private subnets. Defaults to 20.
Netmask length for public subnets. Defaults to 24.
Netmask length for the VPC CIDR block. Defaults to 16.

spec.description: Desired state for the IPv4 network allocation.

crossplane.description: Indicates how Crossplane is reconciling this composite resource

privatePoolId.description: ID of the private subnet IPAM pool.

publicPoolId.description: ID of the public subnet IPAM pool.

ready.description: True when all allocations are complete.

subnets.description: Map of subnet name to allocated CIDR.

vpcPoolId.description: ID of the VPC IPAM pool.

status.description: Observed state of the IPv4 network allocation.

description:
IPV4NetworkAllocation bridges IPAM and Network by creating per-network pools
and reserving IPv4 CIDRs via VPCIpamPoolCidrAllocation. Exposes allocated CIDRs
in status for Network to consume.
